How We Work

The Free Agent Realty Difference

share

  • Share on Facebook
  • Tweet
  • Share on Google+
  • Pin it
  • Share on LinkedIn
  • Send email

Homeowners

When you hire Free Agent Realty to list your home, you gain access to a dedicated professional to sell the property free of commission by agreeing to allow us to represent you in the purchase of your next house. Often times that arrangement results in savings of 3% of the sales price. The additional equity stays with you. By utilizing Free Agent Realty as your buyer’s agent our commission is typically paid for by the seller of the home you purchase.

Selling and buying a $250,000 home
with Free Agent Realty

Sell Your Old House

  • $250,000 House

  • 3% listing agent commission $7,500
  • 3% buyer’s agent commission $7,500
  • Total cost to sell: $7,500

Buy Your New House

  • $250,000 House

  • 3% listing agent commission $7,500
    (paid by the seller of the home)
  • 3% buyer's agent commission $7,500
    (paid to your Free Agent)
  • Total cost to buy: $0

Total savings: $7,500

Commercial Real Estate Owners, Developers, & Builders

At Free Agent Realty we understand your need to protect your investment. We have a program designed to help you maximize your results that is unmatched in the industry. We understand your business and derive great satisfaction by driving serious savings to your bottom line.

We offer full service brokerage as well as lease negotiation and procurement on the same commission free basis. Our commercial clients gain the savings by allowing Free Agent Realty to represent them in subsequent transactions.

Give us a call to discuss how we can help you get the most out of every project.

About

I was born and raised in the Madison area and have deep multifaceted knowledge of the local real estate market. My diverse background includes experience in the sale and acquisition of residential and commercial property, real estate finance, foreclosure and short sales, renovation, real estate development, investment analysis, and construction management . I take great pride in helping my clients achieve their goals weather it be finding the home of their dreams, selling their existing property for top dollar, or assisting them in meeting their investment objectives. Put my broad experience to work for you, I would be honored for the opportunity to earn your business.
